title: Retrograde
lyrics:
I've been sensing something strange
I'm convinced that i'm off my game
I need forgiveness
I need a change
I been sensing something strange

Uh oh, follow the rabbit

Uh oh, into the trees

If you believe in magic

Nothing is what it seems



Hold on until tomorrow

Everything'll be okay

My hearts in a retrograde

Hold on, keep me together

You know what they say

My hearts in a retrograde



You keep shining just for me

In the darkness bending gravity

So if i'm careless with what I say

I blame it all on this retrograde



Uh oh, follow the rabbit

Uh oh, into the trees

If you believe in magic

Nothing is what it seems



Hold on until tomorrow

Everything'll be okay

My heart's in a retrograde

Hold on, keep me together

You know what they say

My heart's in a retrograde



Hold on

(Na na na na na)

Hold on

(Na na na na na)

Hold on

My heart's in a retrograde



Hold on

(Na na na na na)

Hold on

(Na na na na na)

Hold on

My heart's in a retrograde



Hold on, until tomorrow

Everything'll be okay

My heart's in a retrograde

Hold on

(Na na na na na)

Hold on

(Na na na na na)

Hold on

My heart's in a retrograde.
